title: Using the Test Method
content: Regular expressions are named in programming languages to match parts of strings. You create patters to help you do that matching
If you want to find the word 'the' in the string 'The dog chased the cat', you couls use the following expression : /the/. Notice that quote marks are not required withing the regular expression

JavaScript has multiple ways to use regexes. One way to test a reges is using the .test() method. The .test() method takes the regex, applies it to a string(which is placed inside the parentheses), and returns true or false if the patern finds something or not.

instruction: Apply the reges myRegex on the string myString using the .test() method.

hint: You should use .test() to test the regex
